Water Magic School

The elemental magic of water focuses on the manipulation of liquids, ice, and the properties of water.

School Information

Focus Areas

  • Liquids
  • Ice
  • Simple Healing/Mending
  • Flow

Regulation Status: Unregulated Opposing Element: Fire
